wblut.hemesh.tools
Interface HET_UVEvaluator

public interface HET_UVEvaluator

Evaluates a 2-D uv coordinate and returns a 3-D WB_Point. (primarily for implementing simply-described parametric surfaces) hmm, is this a HEC? or a HET? or...?

Author:
David Bollinger
